thread.title: Police close road after rush-hour crash
thread.title_full: Police close road after rush-hour crash

title: Police close road after rush-hour crash
text:
Breaking Police closed the A27 Mansbridge Road after a crash Police close road after rush-hour crash 0 comments 
POLICE have closed a busy Hampshire road after a rush-hour collision. 
The crash happened at about 5.45pm on the A27 Mansbridge Road in Southampton and initially both carriageways of the road were closed. 
Reports suggest that officers have now opened road eastbound but significant traffic is building in the area. 
Anyone with information is asked to contact Hampshire Constabulary on 101. 

@BBCRadioSolent @ROMANSE road reopened eastbound A27 but closed wb at sway thing/Allington rd rb long q's take care pic.twitter.com/EGNlA6kDUD Share article â€” jamie stevenson (@nineteen70) September 29, 2015
